content.erroneous_legal_view: Because of an erroneous legal view of coumarin, a proposal was made to ban it worldwide.
content.classification: This classification is based on controversial results with high doses that could not be confirmed by a committee of functional pathologists. Rather, the malformations involve cholangiomas and minimal/malignant proliferations; the Salamaw experiment.
content.studies: Three different studies established an anti-carcinogenic activity of coumarin. Coumarin exhibited some teratogenic activity.
content.inhalation_studies: Studies of the effect of coumarin by smoke inhalation did not produce any results, since the amount of coumarin transferred to smoke was permissible amounts.
